title: Writing Manuscripts
text: You can publish own children essays photo. Estimate handwriting of other child.

title: Open Networking
text: All profiles can be found and you can look photo, location and manuscripts of each profile.

title: Connect to Telegram
text: On other user page you can open telegram profile.

title: Short Forms
text: Do not scroll so much, you can leaf form parts.

title: Planning Tour
text: Find out many places to visit: explore buildings, statues, landscapes and check facts about place.

title: Europe Cuisine
text: Share own recipes: healthy ingredients and results of cooking.

title: Job Trainings
text: Gaining work skills for children. Choose task and pay own child for it % of cost.

title: Heroes of Epoches
text: Tell you children about great figures of Europe: quotes and achievements in their professions make it easier.
